name: New version
body:
New:
Alway On Weather
4 new clock styles
A new developer page

Improvements:
Fixed duplicate notifications bug
Fixed clock appearance on smaller devices
Minor bug fixes
Memory leak fixes

name: New version - Road to 0.9.6
body:
Improvements for devices without Google Play Services/Google Play Store
Various bug fixes

name: New version
body:
New:
Raise to wake
Battery saver feature
New clock picker screen
New music player control from the always on screen
New swipe down gesture
New donation page
A new date picker screen
An option to press the home button to dismiss the always on display for Samsung devices
Support for Samsung devices with custom roms
A new font
New languages: Thai, Persian

Improvements:
Performance improvements
Improved error reporting
The proximity sensor option now works on Samsung devices
Minor design fixes
Many bug fixes

name: New version
body: Bug fixes

name: New version
body: Bug fixes

name: New version
body: Bug fixes and performance improvemetns

name: New version
body: Bug fixes

name: New version
body: Force close reporter and bug fixes

name: New version
body:
Tasker integration
Notifications now show up as soon as you receive them
Swipe notifications icons to launch the app
Tap the notification content to start the sender app
Potential bug fixes
Bug fixes

name: New version
body:
New:
An option to allow camera shortcuts and use OK Google
Full calendar view is now available
Use gestures to quickly toggle the flashlight
An option to set an exit animation (slide up/fade out)
A quick settings toggle to turn on/off the always on service (Android 7.0)
Greenify integration is now optional
All features are now free for F-droid users

Improvements:
S7 digital optimizations
Smooth entrance animation
Fixed issue with camera shortcut
Bug fixes

name: New version
body:
0.9
Always On Memo
Option to trigger doze with the always on screen active (root only for now)
3 new fonts
New notification style
Design changes to the S7 digital watch face
Settings improvements and more automatic rules options
Translations
Localized date format
Analog clocks bug fixes
Bug fixes to the widget movement

0.89
3 new fonts
2 new clock style
Fixed proximity sensor in Normal mode
Localization and translations
Bug fixes with speech gestures
Bug fixes with display flickering 

0.88
Added a new feedback screen
A new clock style
Some settings rearrangement
Bug fixes for the proximity sensor
More minor bug fixes

0.87
Added S7 digital watch face style
Fixes with 12h formatting
Minor bug fixes

0.86 F
Choose how the proximity sensor works
3 New fonts
Fixes with analog clocks
Fixes with font picker
Notification fixes
Proximity sensor fixes
Force close bug fixes
Translations

name: New version
body:
New:
Added Greenify integration to save battery life
Added an option to preview notification content
Added an option to disable the movement animation
Added a new font: Pixels

Bug fixes:
Fixed issues with the font picker

name: New version
body:
0.8
Proximity sensor (pocket mode) option now works with fingerprint sensor

0.79B
Force close fix
Settings rearrangement
Translations

0.79
Added a self uninstall button

name: New version
body:
0.78
Added an option to use shortcuts (double tap, swipe up) to make the app say the time, notifications and battery status out loud
Added more translations (Thank you)
Fixed a bug with changing the font size
More minor fixes

0.77
Fixed bug where date won't show if auto move is disabled
Reorganized some settings
Added more translations (Thank you)

0.76
A new Customize Watch Face section
Option to change the font!
Analog clock is now an option
Added translations
Bug fixes with wake up

name: New version
body:
0.75
Many code changes, the service should now use less battery
Every user should get the intro screen now
Added more translations (Thank you)

Added your translations
Fixed donation button issues

New and improved intro

Added the translation you created (Thank you)

Really fixed time formatting (24/12)
"Smoother" entrance animation

Fixed notifications issue

Fixed some stuff with setup

Added an "automatic rules" page with battery based rules

name: New version
body:
Added an option to set screen orientation
Nexus/Galaxy shortcut for camera should work fine now
Added stop delay of 2 minutes
Fixed a serious memory leak

name: New version
body:
0.58 + 0.59
Added automatic rules option
Added an option to hide AM/PM
Added an option to change the text color

0.55
Added an option to show date
Added an option to show battery level
Option to customize

name: New version
body:
New:
Added translation link
Added version number in the about section

name: New version
body:
Bug fixes:
Fixed force close issue for android 4.4-
The screen will be dismissed when alarm goes off

New:
Added an option to disable/enable volume keys functionality
Reduced default brightness

name: New version
body:
New:
Reduced time between notifications check
Reduced time between watchface movement
Added preview to widget

Bug fixes:
Solved some memory leak issues (Thanks Maxr1998)
Bug fixes to the widget
Fixed some text mistakes in the app itself

name: New version
body:
New:
New widget to toggle the service
Can now choose 'double tap to dismiss' and 'swipe to dismiss' simultaneously (thanks to Maxr1998)

Bug fixes:
Hide 'back button to dismiss' on phones with softkeys
Brightness control should work now (thanks to Maxr1998)

name: New version
body: Block accidental volume keys click while locked

name: New version
body:
Bug fixes:
Fixed 24H time
Added GitHub link
Fingerprint issues fixes
Changed notification priority to lowest

New
Will now work with 'OK Google' 
Minor changes in the app UI

name: New version
body:
Bug fixes:
Should now start on boot
Should only show clearable notifications (thanks to prashantkhurana)

name: New version
body:
While moving, the watch face will now cover much more area.
Further reducing AMOLED burn in.

name: New version
body:
New:
Added app intro with permission granting
Minor changes in the watchface

Bug fixes:
Should fix brightness issue (thanks to Maxr1998)

name: New version
body:
New:
Volume button to dismiss (Thanks to Maxr1998)
Back button to dismiss
Better way to send email/feedback (Thanks to prashantkhurana)
More design tweaks inside the app

Bug fixes:
Notifications bug fixes (Thanks to Maxr1998)
ANR fix
Some permission fixes
Home button to unlock for some devices

name: Backlight fix
body: Should fix Samsung backlight issue!
